name: Mechawizards
description:
Multiplayer Mech Wizard game.

Controls -

Left Mouse Button - Use Primary Weapon
Right Mouse Button - Use Secondary Weapon
Middle Mouse Button - Melee
Scroll Wheel - Reel In/Loosen Grapple Hook
Shift - Grapple Hook
Space - Jump
Space (hold) - Hover
Tab - Inventory
Q, R, F - Magic 1, 2 & 3
E - Use/Talk
J - Quest Log
Esc - Esc Menu

Control scheme can be swapped in options.

Creators:
Erik Peltola
Igor Parkhomenko
Jan-Mikael Martin
Jimi Mouhu
Joni Kollin
Lumi Ritari
Mila Kuussaari
Onni Forssell
Tino Kankkunen
